remarks: Choice of an upper bound for a possibly empty bunded set (image set version) (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
upbdrech2.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
upbdrech2.bd $e |- ( ph -> E. y e. RR A. x e. A B <_ y ) $.
upbdrech2.c $e |- C = if ( A = (/) , 0 , sup ( { z | E. x e. A z = B } , RR , < ) ) $.
upbdrech2 $p |- ( ph -> ( C e. RR /\ A. x e. A B <_ C ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B y z $.
$d ph x y $.
